name: Nightmarish
description:
By Team MashedPotatoes 

Made in 48 hours for GAME JAM 8! 

"Where am I? I must be dreaming... I need the song to awake."

Unlock the song by navigating the maze and bringing cats to the blue cube.  Beware, the red light flashes as enemies draw near. The game also features (relaxing?) nightmarish music and other fun surprises.

We hope you enjoy the game! 

Controls

ESC - Pause 

MOUSE - Camera 

UP, DOWN, LEFT, RIGHT - Move

COLLISION - Lift Object

Credits
